summary.para: Used in the structure as flags that apply to the current handler.

remarks.para: Only the SYNCMGRHANDLER_HASPROPERTIES and SYNCMGRHANDLER_HIDDEN flags are recognized by Windows Vista. Although Windows Vista recognizes the SYNCMGRHANDLER_HIDDEN flag, it does not currently use it.
All flags are still valid for previous versions of Windows.

summary.para: The current handler provides a property sheet dialog.
May call back the method. This value is ignored in Windows Vista and later.
Indicates Show Handler in Choice even if items are not shown. This value is ignored in Windows Vista and later.
Windows Vista and later. Do not display handler or item. This value is ignored by Windows Vista.
